domain.interfaces
Interface Collisionable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AIControlled, Animated, Inanimated, Menu, Player, Scenario, Sprite, UserControlled
public interface Collisionable

This interface defines the model that a collisionable game entity should have to get its collisions managed by the Collisions class.

Method Summary
 java.awt.Rectangle getCollisionableArea()
          This method should return the bounds of a Collisionable instance.
 java.awt.Rectangle[] getCollisionableAreas()
          This method should return other collisionable areas of the Collisionable instance wich are not its bounding box (getCollisionableArea()).
 java.awt.Point getScenarioCoordinates()
          This method should return the 'world' collisionable upper-left corner coordinates.
 java.awt.Rectangle getVisibleArea()
          This method should return the visible area for this collisionable instance.
 int getZIndex()
          The zIndex indicates wich is the superposition value between collisionables.
 void receiveCollisionFromSprite(Sprite sprite, Collisions.CollisionType type)
          This method should implement the Collision processing.
 void receiveCollisionFromSprite(Sprite sprite, Collisions.CollisionType type, Collisions.CollisionDirection direction)
          This method should implement the Collision processing.
 

Method Detail

getScenarioCoordinates

java.awt.Point getScenarioCoordinates()
This method should return the 'world' collisionable upper-left corner coordinates.

Returns:
The Scenario relative Point.

getVisibleArea

java.awt.Rectangle getVisibleArea()
This method should return the visible area for this collisionable instance.

Returns:
A Rectnalge instance representing the current visible area for a Collisionable instance.

getZIndex

int getZIndex()
The zIndex indicates wich is the superposition value between collisionables. A smaller value indicates it's behind, while a bigger one indicates it's in front.

Returns:
a int value indicating the superposition.

getCollisionableArea

java.awt.Rectangle getCollisionableArea()
This method should return the bounds of a Collisionable instance.

Returns:
a Rectangle instance representing the Collisionable bounds.

getCollisionableAreas

java.awt.Rectangle[] getCollisionableAreas()
This method should return other collisionable areas of the Collisionable instance wich are not its bounding box (getCollisionableArea()).

Returns:
Other Rectangle instances wich are not the bounding box.

receiveCollisionFromSprite

void receiveCollisionFromSprite(Sprite sprite,
                                Collisions.CollisionType type)
This method should implement the Collision processing.

Parameters:
sprite - The causable Sprite instance wich caused the collision
type - The CollisionType caused.

receiveCollisionFromSprite

void receiveCollisionFromSprite(Sprite sprite,
                                Collisions.CollisionType type,
                                Collisions.CollisionDirection direction)
This method should implement the Collision processing.

Parameters:
sprite - The causable Sprite instance wich caused the collision
type - The CollisionType caused.
direction - The CollisionDirection from wich the collision has been received.
